WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
I am wondering if it is possible to use your svg engine to convert svg to pdf. Will it be possible to do that?
Â 
Many Thanks

Comments.Message: In the current iteration it does not seem that this is possible... however.... using the raster output this library provides you can indeed insert the rater into a PDF created by another library for instance iTextSharp, and would be trivial to do such a thing.
